hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="swarm" published_version="1.2.8"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
src_dir=$PWD
ls $src_dir
sudo yum install -y git wget tar
#Go installation 1.9.2 sudo yum install -y tar wget gcc cd $src_dir wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin cd /usr/bin sudo ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc go version
# Git installation git --version
cd $src_dir
sudo yum install -y asciidoc-8.6.8-5.el7.noarch openssl-devel curl-devel expat-devel perl-ExtUtils-MakeMaker gettext-devel tar make git clone https://github.com/git/git.git cd $src_dir/git git checkout v1.8.5
ls $src_dir
make prefix=/usr/local && sudo make prefix=/usr/local install export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH
export GOPATH=$src_dir export PATH=$HOME/go/bin:$PATH:$GOPATH/bin export GOPATH=$GOPATH:$GOPATH/src/github.com/docker/swarm/Godeps/_workspace/
cd $src_dir go get github.com/tools/godep
ls $src_dir
mkdir -p $src_dir/src/github.com/docker
cd $src_dir/src/github.com/docker
git clone https://github.com/docker/swarm.git cd swarm git checkout v1.2.8
echo $GOROOT
go install github.com/docker/swarm/
export SWARM_HOST=2375
swarm -v
